About:
KOBU Agency is an award-winning digital branding agency working from Portugal to the world. We build exciting and meaningful brands for the 21st century.

KOBU Agency is a digital branding agency that helps businesses grow through strategic design and storytelling. They specialize in brand identity, digital experiences, and content creation to drive engagement and results.

KOBU Agency has create work across different segments: Health and Tech; Tourism and Luxury Hospitality/Real Estate, Products & Services, Culture & Society.

KOBU Agency has a minimum engagement level of 10.000EUR and the average project is around 25.000EUR.

KOBU Agency's rate for 2024 is 1000EUR/day
